titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 3210) to ensure the continued financial capacity of insurers to provide coverage for risks from terrorism.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-782, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 3210.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 239.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 607.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/13/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the conference report to accompany H.R. 3210 (terrorism reinsurance).
